about_the_game:
Become the owner of a studio, hosting multiple monster girls; engage with them through kinky dialogues, satisfy their needs, so they can satisfy yours: the girls will earn their keep as they are starred in erotic shows with you for viewers of all kinds coming from all across the world just to watch a good show before retiring to their rooms to sleep for the night. Upgrade your inn through the gold you earn from these shows and rise to the rank of legends with your inn!

Manage your studio

As your fame grows, various monster girls arrive, wanting nothing more than a cozy inn to live in, but with an alternative way to pay for it. Make sure they never slack off, managing their training and resting times to bring them to the best shape, while saving some energy for the nightly erotic shows! Satisfied guests open new opportunities, allowing you to hire more girls, to be placed in more spots, unlocking cute and sexy outfits.

Chat with the Girls

By flirting with the girls, and learning about their needs and personalities, giving them gifts and taking them on dates, you earn their trust, unlocking you new H-scenes, the animations in them becoming available for you during the erotic shows, to be used on any and all of your girls.

Erotic Shows

Guests will arrive at the doorstep of your establishment, thirsty to see a good show you'd put up with the girls. They each come with different tastes and it is your task as the boss to arrange them into groups of threes, where their tastes synergize, allowing you to satisfy the most of them at the same time. Doing so allows you to gain great rewards: more outfits, money to upgrade your inn with, and fame, drawing in more important and well paying guests, raising the challenge level.

40+ H-scenes

Pile memories of private, sexy fun times with your harem of girls inside your gallery.

Achievements, Tasks

Reaching milestones in your progress will unlock precious rewards, while random tasks encourage a varied gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game revolve around sexuality e.g.
* the story 
* the characters
* the adult cutscenes

In some scene interactions between 2 or more adults are shown.  The erotic movements and nudity of women are  frequent in the game. 

No violence and drug in the game.

name: Voyeur Villa - Living with Monster Girls Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL® Pentium Dual Core G3250
  • Graphics: Any with dx11 support
  • Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant

short_description: Travelers gather at your doors, looking to see sexy monster girls in action, starring you and your staff full of cute, exhibitionistic monster girls. Grow your fame through the nightly shows, carefully orchestrated to fit the guests' viewing desires!
